name: Frenzy Plant
description: You summon a whirlwind of jagged branches and razor sharp leaves that batter all creatures in a 30 foot circle, centered on you. All creature caught in the flurry must make a DEX saving throw against your Move DC, taking 3d8 + MOVE grass damage on a failure, and half as much on a success. This move saps you of energy, and may not activate it again until after the end of your next turn.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles all other Pokemon. User cannot act in the next turn.
